definition: to grapple (with the enemy)/to fight at the risk of one's life
to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.chinese: 這些是州是他們拼殺的“戰場”。

sentences.english: I want to have an American GI to talk with.
sentences.chinese: 我希望在旁邊有個同在戰場上拼殺過的哥們聊聊天。
